title: Jelly Jars
description: A girl in the one place she never wanted to be.Meeting the one person she never expected.But what Peggy Nieman doesn't realize is that her life is about to change, as two broken souls fatefully collide. The only question is: will they heal one another ... or destroy one another? Because one thing is certain ... they can't quit one another.
author: S.J. Varengo
